amendment.description: Amendment increases the authorization level for child care block grants by $150 million for fiscal years 1996-2000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to authorize an additional $160 million per year from FY 1996 through FY 2000 for child care block grants. The bill provides for $1,943,000,000 and the proposed addition would provide for $2,093,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Johnson (CT) amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
